summary: It adds 12 expert conjuration shcool spell
descriptionHtml:
Sky Wrath (Shaman)

Author : Protomouse

Version :

1.2 - Add 9 more conjuration spell
1.1 - Add 3 more conjuration spell
1.0 - Initial

Description :

This mod is just for fun, the main purpose is to add support to your elemetal summon.
It adds 12 conjuration shcool spell

[ apprentice ]

1. Summon Fire Strike
2. Summon Frost Strike
3. Summon Thunder Strike

[ Adept ]

1. Summon Sky Bliss Adept (frost) 
2. Summon Sky Storm Adept (shock)
3. Summon Sky Wrath Adept (fire)

[ expert ]

1. Summon Sky Bliss Expert (frost) 
2. Summon Sky Storm Expert (shock)
3. Summon Sky Wrath Expert (fire)

[ expert ]

1. Summon Sky Bliss Mastery (frost) 
2. Summon Sky Storm Mastery (shock)
3. Summon Sky Wrath Mastery (fire)

Charateristic :

1. It can\'t be cast indoor
2. The base damage is 40 for fire & frost, and 50 for shock (can increase by destruction perk or mod)
3. Ritual cast animation (use both hand)
4. Apprentice is a curse spell like soul trap 

Note :

1. It may look like intense spell casting that pour down lots spell per/sec, but the actual is just one that really aiming the target. That will recast every 1 - 3 sec varies on the spell.
2. You can buy the spell tomes from Fallion at Morthal

Glitch :

The lightning flash some time can not be seem in 3D person cam, with angle facing down below the horizon.
But if u facing up to the sky or above the horizon, the flashes is always appear along with the thundering sound.

Cheers..

Installation :

Unzip those files and put into your skyrim data folder.
Ex: \"c:\\program files\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\\"
Activate using skyrim launcher in the data files or whatever mod manager you use.

Uninstallation :

Just delete those file you copied in the data folder when you installed the mod.

Compatibilities :

This mod is tested in skyrim version 1.4.21.0.4 patch & adapted in adept difficulty level.

Conflict & issues :

- Make sure to backup your skyrim saves games, incase it corrupt your save games system.
author: Protomouse
